entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:58 PM EDT Saturday 11 March 2023
